name: Fishing for Compliments!
description:
Meet Maybelle, after a tough rejection, down on her luck, and feeling sorry for herself--she decides that she too can look good! Dress her up by mixing and matching different pieces of clothing, then pick a fishing spot, be it down town, at a park or at the beach--and Fish! For Compliments! (Literally!) 

Fish up all kinds of different characters, and have them grade your style! Strike a few poses for them as well, both your style and poses will effect your score with them. Earn points to buy more outfits, rinse and repeat!

When posing: 

W for cute wave pose

S for Flex

A for Neutral Pose

When done posing press Space to end Dialogue (Buggy, needs a lot of work).

Businessman NPC is bugged. Will give no points or dialogue. 

When 100 points or more press Space in the dorm room for credits 

(When in dorm room press I for 100 free points, courtesy of me lol)

**Developed  for the 'My First Game Jam'  2021
